title: Stream: Nightlives – A Wink In The Face Of Death
content:
One of the best album titles of the year comes from Toronto duo Nightlives, in the form of their debut LP A Wink In The Face Of Death.

Released earlier this week, it’s a record characterised by it’s menacing, sultry atmosphere yet intertwined with a stark refusal to abandon any of it’s pop influences. Where The Neighbourhood drew the line between Foster The People and Lana Del Rey, Nightlives pick up a similar baton however mixing in a healthy dose of shoegaze. Check out their debut LP below, including the previous heard Give Nothing and Underneath.
